title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2021 about dataset annotation aggregation and how to interpret multiple experts annotators
<|assistant|>

Here is a reading list of 20 articles up to 2021 about dataset annotation, aggregation, and how to interpret multiple expert annotators. These articles cover various aspects of the topic, including the challenges of dataset annotation, methods for aggregating annotations, and techniques for interpreting multiple expert annotators
Data Annotation: A Survey
This survey paper provides an overview of data annotation, its importance, and various methods used for annotation
Data Annotation for Machine Learning: A Survey
This article extends the survey on data annotation by discussing the challenges and opportunities in machine learning applications

author.particle: on Data Annotation for Deep Learning" by

title: This article focuses on the challenges and opportunities in deep learning applications and provides a comprehensive survey of data annotation techniques
